class_notes: First year MPH/MSPH students interested in the Social Determinants of Health Certificate preference, second year students with instructor permission.
course_description: This course will introduce students to the breadth of SDOH related research that is being conducted by Emory RSPH and ECAS faculty affiliated with the SDOH certificate program. Students will also be exposed to community groups addressing SDOH issues. This course is a required core course for the SDOH certificate program.
schedule_location: T 9am-9:50am in R. Randall Rollins Bldg. RL20
sections: Class Nbr: 1696, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: T 9-9:50a, Instructor: Gazmararian/Ansorge, Status: Open
